name: Tilt Maze (itch)
description:
CONTROLS:

Use LEFT CLICK to grab and control the maze

Use RIGHT CLICK to open doors

 

Tilt Maze is a colorful collection of fun and challenging puzzle mazes to solve. Tilt the maze and click around doors and obstacles in your way to collect points and get to the red goal hoop at the end of each puzzle!

This game was made as my junior year game project at the College for Creative Studies in 2020. I was able to create all art assets and code the game completely with a small bit of help from my professors.

If you would like to check out more of my work, visit www.sarahkosco.com

Thank you for playing!
